# SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ SceneKit ](/documentation/scenekit)

- [ SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey ](/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey)

-  SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey 

Global Variable# SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey

iOS 8.0–26.0DeprecatediPadOS 8.0–26.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–26.0DeprecatedmacOS 10.8–26.0DeprecatedtvOS 9.0–26.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–26.0DeprecatedwatchOS 3.0–26.0Deprecated

```
let SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey: String
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey#Discussion)

The up-axis for the scene. For example, if the scene is oriented y-up, the corresponding value is the string `"0.0 1.0 0.0"`.

## [See Also](/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneSourceAssetUpAxisKey#see-also)
